reviews.review_msg: Inspiring very understanding and easy to follow pace

LOVE him. he is the best prof out thr. no one else can compare, brain, parsa, no one else is better than him. he was my first computer prof. and i think he is the only reason, i was able to continue this degree. I feel like if it was any one else, i would have changed majors. Lowkey sad tho, caz i thought every prof was gonna be like this :(

Professor Vincent was excellent and helpful in and out of class. He would offer extra office hours and help everyone. He also allowed us to have cheat sheets for the final, which no other class had. I would take any class he's teaching.

This is for CMPT 415. He was extremely kind and consistently helpful when you didn't understand things. Very flexible and especially understanding during exam season. Overall, a great professor. If you see this I love you Nick.

Amazing prof - so chill, I'm convinced he meditates before every lecture. Homework and exams? Easier than picking a Netflix show (okay, maybe not that easy, but close). Learned a lot without crying - a rare feat. If I say â€˜I approve,' you know it's legit. Take this course with him, or forever regret your life choices. 10/10 would enroll again.

He is amazing! His first test was hard but then he noticed it so made the final easier. We have many coding assignments but are straightforward, and he is always there to help inside and outside of class. He also allowed to have a cheat sheet for the final which is amazing. Honestly do not hesitate to take a class with him.
he is the best prof I've ever had

Dr. Nicholas Vincent is an amazing prof. His lectures are great but not  necessaty and he posts slides and records lectures - although for fall 2024 only audio of lectures was availabile due to technical limitations. Assignment instructions and rubrics are clear and fair, and is very accesibile. Dr. Nicholas Vincent is great and I would take again.

Nick is an amazing professor. He is super caring, he responds very quickly to emails, hes got a good canvas page thats easy to understand and has great office hours. He also give students practice questions that are very helpful for the exams. He is by far the best professor I have had. He is also very smexy.

A great professor for introducing new comers to computer science! Explained at a level where everyone was able to understand and actually incorporated meaningful feedback from previous terms. Assignments and quizzes were well designed to help in learning course content. 

I pray I could have professors like this for higher level courses.

GOATed prof giving amazing lectures and reasonable tests. His email response time was unbelievably fast. He went out of his way to make us a website so we could practice for the final exam. I am so glad I took his class, probably the best, kindest, and most caring CMPT professor at SFU.

Nick is a really really great prof. He is super caring and clearly cares about his students success in the course, he asks for feedback on a lot of the projects and course materials to improve upon for future courses as well. He's also a really good lecturer and Id happily take a course with him as a professor again any time

Boy oh boy where do I even begin. Dr. Nicholas Vincent..honey, my pookie bear. I have loved you ever since I first laid eyes on you. I would do anything for you. I wish it were possible to freeze time so I would never have to leave your side. I would sacrifice my own life it were the only thing that could put a smile on your beautiful face.

Nick has amazing lectures and genuinely wants his students to succeed. He provides so many resources and takes any feedback from students to do well in the course. Super quick email response time as well.

Simply the GOAT prof. Lays everything out for you and describes everything that will be on tests. Responds to emails immediately, and genuinely wants to help you. Provides a variety of resources and tools to help aid your learning.

Nick makes amazing lectures and is so passionate about cs. He is willing to help students in whatever way he can to succeed and provides so many resources and ways to learn and review. highly recommend

Dr Vincent is one of the best profs I've ever had, not to mention he is a HOT HOT HOTTIE. There isn't a single reason I wouldn't recommend this man('s class). Also he has a deep love for memes and AI. He's amazing I wish I could take this class over and over again forever. I love computer science :D
He is a really nice and kind professor

Dr. Vincent was a really good prof. Although he is new, he is pretty well-organized and you can see that he is truly interested in the topic that he teaches. He is very good at answering questions and actually cares about his students. One of the best profs I've had.
Best prof I have taken so far. He even codes with you during class. Very available and helpful office hours. Also pretty clear and concise lectures

I took CMPT 419 Special Topics in AI with Nick in Spring 2024. One of the best profs in CMPT.

He studies and teaches his own research so everything in the class was quite relevant to where computer science is headed. 

You won't learn too much technical work but he connects technical matters with concepts.

Not a hard grader but fair in general.

Took CMPT 419. Easily the best prof in SFU by far. Lectures aren't mandatory but are engaging and interesting. He's extremely passionate about what he teaches and readings are up to date, the oldest being a paper from 2021. He tries to know what students are interested in to include relevant content into the course. Extremely friendly and kind.
The best prof I ever met. He is very open to change teaching style if students ask. The assignments' instructions were clear and easy to follow.

lectures are delivered enthusiastically and in a way that engages the class. all topics are explained intuitively and clearly. all lectures are recorded and easily accessible. assignments and tests contained only material that was taught and there were no surprises. everything was marked fairly generously. amazing prof and course, would recommend
great prof, super helpful and accommodating.

Great proffesor! Prioritized students with frequent office hours and quick email responses as well as offered lots of extra material that was not mandatory but very helpful. He speaks fast but you can always ask him to clarify but other than that lectures were easy to follow and were helpful. Wish I could rate this professor higher he was amazing.

Nick Vincent was a good prof overall. I had zero coding experience and struggled heavily in this course at first. Through hard work, I was able to earn an A-. Exams were fair. Coding assignments can be a bit challenging, final project was a slight test of my patience. Decent experience overall.
Great prof.
i was very scared going into this class but it was actually very manageable. he responds to messages quickly and went above and beyond to provide us with extra resources and help. best prof

Nick is such a caring prof and really does all he can to help students succeed. During his office hours, he was able to help explain why I ran into so many problems or roadblocks during assignments. Lectures are recorded and slides are posted in-advance, so there is no need to rush copying down code. Exams are fair and cheat-sheets are allowed.

He is a very caring person and genuinely wants to see everyone succeed. He had a lot of sympathy since he realized this is a course taken mostly by students in their first semester and contionusly tried to help everyone succeed.
SUPER GREAT PROF! 10/10 would recommend. open to grade appeals and replied very quickly to email. very fair marker and seems like he genuinely wants the best for all his students
best cs prof ever!
He was a nice fellow.

Prof Vincent was a great teacher. As someone who has had no experience in coding i was able to get an A- and understand all the topics. He is very understanding and helpful. The final was a bit tough but overall the material was easy to understand even for a beginner and the class was well paced. I am glad I had him as my prof
Great prof, great communication with students, the course itself is pretty simple but he makes it more convenient for students. Would take him again 100%
By far the best professor I have met this term. I just messed up my final; otherwise, all my grades were good. Getting an A- to A grade in his class is very much possible.
W prof
Great prof. Enjoyed CMPT120 with him this sem. If you already know a bit of coding, this class will be a breeze.

Very caring and always willing to help and answer questions. Friendly and approachable, since it was his first year teaching there were a couple things that were disorganized but VERY open to feedback which was great!
a very sweet teacher who cares for his students. I will say the final was a bit tough but everything else was easy. Glad i got to have him as my prof this semester

everyone ik vibes with prof vincent. he cares a lot about students and if the material is understood and always asks for input on what to improve. he is very considerate and dedicates lots of time to helping out the class and making material easier to understand. i looked forward to lectures as they were always engaging and taught at a good pace.
He was the BEST prof I ever had. the lectures were clear.
Really good CS prof, both for people who haven't and have programmed before. Midterm was easy and final was fair.
my goat
super chill guy and knows his stuff, attend lectures or watch recordings and enjoy the class

The best professor has excellent industry experience unmatched by any other staff.
Unfortunately, he's leaving. I was happy that he was my professor.
BEST PROF
VERY NICE
